Patients with Peho-like Syndrome present clinical features that include a wide range of dysmorphic features, developmental delay, seizures, hypotonia, and feeding difficulties. The 22q11.2 deletion syndrome is a genetic disorder caused by the loss of genetic material from chromosome.
